guardrails.title: No silent behavior changes
guardrails.description: In MVP stage A, do not change core behavior of existing routes/flows; only add transparency and read-only surfaces.

guardrails.title: CamelCase + ISO dates
guardrails.description: All public API responses must use camelCase and ISO-8601 date strings.

guardrails.title: No write endpoints in Stage A
guardrails.description: Lawbook is read-only in Stage A: no editor, no overrides, no audit/write APIs.
